name: Towards a perilous journey
description: Situated midway between shoot'em up and musical game, Towards a Perilous Journey puts you in charge of a squad of two ships in Virtual Reality. Go through each of the 24 chronicles and face the many enemies that will appear according to the rhythm and intensity of the music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 6500 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Storage: 1 GB available space
